name: Timothy Brits
bio: Humanitarian advocate in Pretoria. This site is dedicated to raising awareness about global crises and sharing ways you can help.

links.title: Kronilo
links.description: A tool to translate cron expressions into natural language

links.title: ShareTheMeal
links.description: A UN World Food Programme initiative that lets you donate meals to children and families in crisis with just one tap.

links.title: GiveDirectly
links.description: A highly rated charity that sends cash directly to people living in extreme poverty, empowering them to meet their own needs with dignity and choice.
